title: Toxic Players considering quitting.
body:
Hey guys, I think this game can be addictive in a sense that when you get home from school or from a long day of work you want to relieve stress by playing. This, for me, came at a cost of currently getting my main account perma banned which i played since season 1 on it. Its rough, but i have decided to quit due to  extreme levels of toxicity and i would like to formally apologize to ANYONE i mistreated throughout the 5 years of playing this game.

Just a message out to the "toxic players" which i once was ; look at yourself, evaluate what you are, and what is the purpose behind calling someone "autistic" or wishing cancer upon someone.  Just because  Warwick missed smite at baron pit 25 mins into the game does not give you free regin on abusing him, maybe he has already gone through an extensive amount of abuse throughout the years, why does he need yours?

And a quick message to the Players who are supportive and Anti-toxic the "norms" ; Keep doing you, you're strong enough to overcome the temptation of calling someone out, you're wise and intelligent, I believe people like you deserve greater rewards, and I wish you well for all your journeys ahead! :)  

Much love,

HGdubz, Call Me "Friend" , Highlight Reel
